name: The Little Tank Hunter
description:
Your mission is to destroy the tank master, can you do it?

Shoot yourself through various levels and collect coins. Be careful, if you die you lose some of them. Find the hidden emeralds and use them to upgrade your tank skills. Unlock different tank skins. Test you skills in the Endless mode. Remix Mode same levels, but harder and slightly different.

FEATURES

  • 60 levels
  • 7 bonus levels
  • 5 boss fights
  • endles mode
  • remix mode
  • 14 tank skins
  • 5 over worlds
  • 2 side quest
  • 4 different different levels "easy, normal, hard and impossible"
